mapper.select: SELECT game.* FROM mygame, game WHERE mygame.userId = #{userId} AND mygame.gameId = game.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mygame WHERE gameId = #{gameId} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mygame(userId,gameId) SELECT #{userId},#{gameId} from DUAL WHERE not EXISTS (SELECT userId, gameId FROM mygame WHERE userId=#{userId} and gameId=#{gameId})
